CatDescriptText: Harry Bobo, manager, Uptown 88 Bar, 37 Mayflower Street, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 26, 1958, pg. 6 with question: "Do you believe the trouble in Middle East will start an atomic world war?" answer reads: "I don't believe Russia wants a war. The United States doesn't want a war.  I don't believe Russia is ready for an all-out atomic war."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Harry Bobo wearing moustache, light colored short sleeve shirt with pen in left breast pocket, seated at booth with table and ashtray on left in interior with two toned walls, possibly the Uptown 88 Bar
